# Vite Installation

## Step 1 - Node.js installed?

Vite requires Node.js version 14.18+, 16+. However, some templates require a higher Node.js version to work, please upgrade if your package manager warns about it.

[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en)

## Step 2 - Create Vite App

```bash
npm create vite@latest
```

```bash
yarn create vite
```

```bash
pnpm create vite
```

## Optional - Template

Choose a community template to start your project

[GitHub Vite Templates](https://github.com/vitejs/awesome-vite#templates)


```bash
npm create vite@latest --template [templatename]
```

## Step 3 - Follow CLI prompts

Type a name for your project 
Select the framework you wanna use for your project 
Choose TypeScript or JavaScript (Ignore SWC for now)

## Step 4 - Install Dependencies and Start Server

```bash
cd [projectname]
npm i
npm run dev
code .
```

## Step 1 - Install daisyUI 

```bash
npm i -D daisyui@latest
```

## Step 2 - Add daisyUI to your tailwind.config

```js
tailwind.config.js

module.exports = { 
//... 
plugins: [require("daisyui")], 
}
```
